results.description: Andri Ragettli is a freestyle skier, and his new training routine is quite tricky! Check it out.

results.description: Madi Rowlands says her future is uncertain after being prescribed blood thinning medication.

results.title: Madi Rowlands: Blood clot halts freestyle skier's career

results.description: Kirsty Muir has earned a place on the Great Britain senior freestyle skiing team at the age of 15. Now she is dreaming of the Winter Olympics.
results.title: Watch: From family holidays to the Winter Olympics?

results.title: The Alaskan competition involves skiing on water and snow

results.description: Watch the best action from the final day of the British Ski & Snowboarding Championships in Switzerland, as Tom Greenway and 14-year-old Amy Clayton win the ski slopestyle events.

results.title: 2019 GB Freestyle Championships: Tom Greenway & Amy Clayton win in ski slopestyle

results.description: Watch second day highlights from the British Ski & Snowboarding Championships in Switzerland, as 12-year-old Mia Brookes is "head and shoulders" above the rest winning gold in the Big Air.

results.title: 2019 GB Freestyle Championships: 12 year-old Mia Brookes wins gold in the Snowboard Big Air

results.description: A group of skiers were caught by surprise after being trapped in an off-piste avalanche in Austria.
results.title: Off-piste skiers swallowed by Austria avalanche

thumbnail.altText: A skier caught in an avalanche in St Anton am Arlberg, Austria.

results.description: In the final video of our 2019 series of #WorkoutWednesday routines, Great Britain's freestyle skier Rowan Cheshire guides you through an intense HIIT routine.

results.description: Bosses had said the leisure centre would open in 2019 but now expect it to be ready by 2022.
results.title: Middlesbrough snow centre 'to open in 2022'

results.description: British world champion freestyle skier James Woods is to "take some time off skiing", a week after winning World Championship slopestyle gold.
